messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

update tuesday february pm moves va february re moves la si la head analysis february re moves se february moves bun care ii friday february pm re moves care va ca ca respective ca late notice cat cost effective merci thursday february re moves bun mas la weekend se transport ex pc etc ii ca wednesday february moves si la plan care care ii cam care loc motive si care la pot si intr prima wednesday february re moves plan liber ne la la la se mute la plan tuesday pm re moves si potential care ii inca tuesday re moves se la la tuesday pm moves ca se mute la weekend si parte va si si si weekend la unit
